lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I am enthralled with efficiency of microfinance and have been thoroughly impressed with the Kiva concept (not to mention the simple and well designed site!) .
lender.occupational_info:
My career has been focused on the technology/internet industry. Currently, I am switching gears and volunteering overseas for at least the next 6 months.
This November I will be going to Nigeria to volunteer with an organization called IDEA Builders (www.ideabuilders.org).
IDEA Builders mainly works with women in Rural Nigeria to help set up micro-enterprises. I will be over there to help work on Partnerships and Fundraising for the organization, and I think that Kiva could play a large role in that.
Please drop me a line if you have any other fundraising idea's, comments or questions.
My email is gregorygunn@gmail.com.
Thanks!

lender.name: Becca
lender.loan_because: It keeps me humble. Growing up, I had very little, and still I view myself on the very bottom rung of the financial ladder. And it's so easy to let myself get tied up in all that I do not have, and forget that there are so many people all around the world that don't have food or water, or shelter, or even the assurance that they will survive to see the next week. Kiva reminds me that although I do not have a lot, the little that I have to give means a lot to those who have nothing.

lender.name: PISCO EL PATRON
lender.loan_because: Courtesy: El Patron
lender.occupational_info:
Courtesy: El Patron Vineyard South America, Peru Pisco, name of the traditional drink and patrimony of Peru, is the symbol of Peruvian pride and nationality.
The Spanish conqueror of the Tahuantisuyo Empire was Francisco Pizarro. He was mean, brave, and illiterate that is to say he didn't know how to read neither to write, not even his own name. He signed with a trembling heading.
Pizarro arrived to Cajamarca on November the 15th 1532. He sent Hernando Pizarro to visit the Inca Atahualpa to his Pultumarca camp. After waiting one night and almost the whole next day, the Inca made his appearance in a bunk of gold, arriving to the center of the triangular square of Cajamarca.
Starting from that moment it took place the conquest of the great Inca Empire. The Inca Atahualpa was executed on July the 26th 1533.
Francisco Pizarro's ambition was overflowing; he was the biggest investor in the conquest of Peru. Pizarro obtained big benefits from the takeover. In 1540 he had 27,000 natives that paid him taxes; productive mines of gold in Cuquiabo and silver in Porco, houses, land, plantations, mills, livestock and slaves. Great fortune that was sent to Spain. Peru was a great business for Pizarro and his siblings. There was an agreement between the Crown and Pizarro.
He was murdered by the Almagristas on 1541 with a lunge in the throat. Later the Spanish Crown took charge of the government.
Peruvian Pisco - Tradicional Drink
The Spaniards brought grape liquor that with the time was elaborated in Peru. It was named "pisco", name that has three origins: means a Quechua word that translated to English means "bird". The mud container was called "botija", where pisco was deposited. Pisco, city and name of a town that belongs to the Ica valley, correspond to a very important event. The great Independence leader José de San Martin disembarks in the Paracas bay in Pisco, September 8th, 1820. The botija was a practical container that used in the elaboration of pisco and then to transport and keep it. In the botija the grape juice was fermented and distilled. Afterwards the pisco is stored in botijas. When the botijas are empty they stowed them face down, until being used again in the next vintage. All this shows that no other country can copy the Peruvian PISCO Varié ti Of. Piscos • Pisco Quebranta: After vintage, the Quebranta grapes are crushed and pressed. Then, the grape pressing is transferred to casks where fermentation begins. Eight days later, the famous "cachina" is ready. During the third week the must is distilled in stills or alembics. The result is an unequaled Pure Peruvian Pisco, unique in the world. • Pisco Acholado: (Half-breed) is the result of the distillation of Quebranta and Italia grapes. Each bottle of Pisco La Botija (750 ml) contains approximately 13 pounds of grapes. • Pisco Italia: El Patron’s Pisco Italia is made through a slow process using 100% distilled Italia grape juice. The result is a unique pisco with a great bouquet and an unrivaled flavor. El Patron has excellent vineyards are situated in the Chincha valley, in the Ica region and are cultivated using the latest techniques. This combination has granted this pisco its world famous quality. When you visit Peru, also visit El Patron’s vineyard. El Patron´s Pisco Sour's Recipe 3 Glasses of pisco 1 ½ Glass of sugar 2 Glasses of lemon juice White of an egg Shaken ice Add drops of Amargo Angostura
Preparation: Be prepare the PISCO SOUR only in liquidizer, put the egg white and liquefy once that up some spark add the ice until the middle of glass (this is a secret to get that the drink has a texture very heavy, slowly move it and add the ingredients; but not bitter of Angostura, liquefy until the ice be melt.
If it is necessary add some ice water and rectify carefully the quality of a good PISCO SOUR.

LABLE 3
Green Street bar manager Missy Kalkofen pours a traditional pisco sour. (Josh Reynolds for the Boston Globe)
A Peruvian favorite shakes up the bar scene 37 comments 2006 www.drinksmixer.com Pisco Sour posted by Dean Jacobs @ 04:10AM, 6/18/06 A typical Pisco Sour also has egg white and a drop of Angostura on the top when poured. Plus Cinnamon! Posted by Ian Dubelaar @ 03:58PM, 7/20/06 Yes, the egg white is important for the frothy consistency. Also, these are invariably served with a dash of cinnamon riding jauntily in the centre of the foam. Pisco sour Posted by jay @ 04:34PM, 7/22/06 Usually is made with sugar syrup as well. Inca Pisco Sour Posted by Marv Toleson @ 01:48PM, 7/25/06 I was introduced to this great cocktail in 1962 when I was in the Army at Ft. Bragg, NC. The bartender at the Gunner's Lodge O Club took it out of his 'book' and made it a featured drink special one week It took off from there in popularity and was a staple and refreshing drink for both men and women while I was there until 1964.
PS: Yes, the bartender did also use egg white, liquid or a powder, to give the drink that little appealing frothy look. Pisco sour posted by felipe @ 12:19AM, 8/19/06 ..and you should use syrup instead of sugar... the egg white is usually one for one liter of pisco sour. It is intended to make the "foam". My favorite drink Posted by Joe Light @ 02:49AM, 9/26/06 Your have to try this drink, just try it. Missing allot of ingredients Posted by Johanna Quintana @ 06:49AM, 10/06/06 You are missing egg whites and icing sugar--crucial part of Pisco sour. What happened to egg white?? Posted by Gonzalo @ 07:38AM, 11/12/06 It is not pisco sour if it doesn't have egg white. Recipe amendment Posted by Stephen Burgess @ 02:44PM, 12/01/06 Not true. The Angostura is only added to create a Pisco Piranha. Without Angostura is a Pisco Sour!!! The Best!! Posted by Millie @ 03:58PM, 12/17/06

lender.name: Karen Ryan
lender.loan_because: Karen received her first Kiva Gift certificate from her grandson Ben. We are continuing this account in her memory.
lender.occupational_info:
Karen was especially interested in loaning to women looking to get their own businesses going.
We hope continuing her loans will be a small piece of the puzzle of solving a few of the world's problems.
She loved the beach, gardening, beautiful big trees, the New York Times crossword puzzles, her online games, and a good book.
Those who loved her knew she was a witch...but a benevolent one.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can- God has blessed me
lender.occupational_info: we make beverages from açai berries that grow in the Brasilian Amazon

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: there are people who need the money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I shoot television shows, sporting events and commercials.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who need it.

lender.name: Emerson
lender.loan_because: I have learned about the effectiveness of these micro loans

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I am commited to helping people that have no other method to get a start.
lender.occupational_info: Computer programming

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Computer stuff.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I like to think every little bit helps.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to support small businesses and farms
lender.occupational_info: I'm researching how the spinal cord controls movement.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I'm a bleeding-heart capitalist.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a history teacher and the advisor to our school's Kiva Club.

lender.name: David W. Frey
lender.loan_because:
To whom much is given, much is expected.
"We make a living by what we get, We make a life by what we give."

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life and world. It's not what you have, but how you use it.
lender.occupational_info: I provide office support & coordinate volunteers at branch office of a large non-profit

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: I love people who want to proactively change their lives and step into the unknown of entrepreneurship. Also, a trememdous amount of credit should be given to XL Las Vegas, namely, Tamara and Namaste, for relentlessly lobbying on behalf of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I basically put gorgeous graphics on trucks for an art gallery on the roads of America. I also am a media wholesaler 20-50% off of rate cards globally.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help out in some small way ! I was once a mother struggling to raise my 2 boys, and lots of people helped me out.. Just want to help someone else however I can !
lender.occupational_info: I help people find new homes to buy and help people sell their homes.

lender.name: danny
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to potentially have a dramatic impact to someone's life.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I want to help others find success in their business and to allow them the freedom to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a developer of shopping centers.

lender.name: ruth
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: I sell plants to the good people of London

lender.name: Garance
lender.loan_because: women empowerment is the future! http://www.youtube.com/v/4Yy2L3jUZbc&hl=es

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: This makes more sense to me than any other charity model.

lender.name: Harbour Walk Weymouth
lender.loan_because: I expect if I actually met one of these people I would lend them $25
lender.occupational_info: I run a guesthouse in Weymouth Dorset England. - one of the most beautiful parts of the country.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it! It's wonderful to have the chance to help someone reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I have many different small businesses myself, including freelance writing and illustration I provide to websites and publications. I have several websites of my own, and have written a book.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Micro loans have been proven to directly help the person receiving them, their families, and their communities. It is one of the most effective ways of ending poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It's a good feeling to help people out, as well as putting to work some of the savings I have.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people fund their retirement, education, and other financial needs.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea! To make a gift, helps only for a short time, but lending helps the people to help themselves.

lender.name: ROGER
lender.loan_because: So many people have given me opportunities and never asked to be repaid.
lender.occupational_info: Sales manager for a company that supplies hydraulic leveling systems worldwide.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with many people who have helped me along the way and I want to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital, taking care of the sick and injured.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I realize that I am very fortunate to have so much abundance in my life. I want to help others achieve their goals as well. As my lady is from Kenya (Meru), I like the idea of helping Africans grow their business.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, I am doing financial work for the US government in the Middle East. I am a long way from home and I miss my house, my family and my friends. But the money I save by working here will do a lot of good in my life (and other people's life as well).

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are working hard to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to high school students.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs and would like to see them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I have a boring, tedious and monotonous job in the banking industry, but I am grateful that it pays the bills.

lender.name: Alberto Salazar
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to world developing economies, mostly in Mexico.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and I want to be part of helping other people become financially independent so they can take care of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I create art that is made into posters and other paper products. I also work with artists so they can develop their business.

lender.name: janeway216
lender.loan_because: this way my money's doing some good in the world.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people through microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an computer design engineer currently for Hewlett-Packard.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: God blesses people to be a blessing to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company as of right now and I take care of my 4 children. I too am getting ready to take a step of faith into my own business and I understand what it take to get a business started. Be Bless

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: the fact that I can help someone else by loaning what I would pay for a meal out makes it a moral imperative.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional singer, arranger and composer/lyricist.

lender.name: Marge
lender.loan_because: I believe that industrious people with limited funds need a headstart.

lender.name: Roger & Carol
lender.loan_because: The money goes to people who want to help themselves rather than just a handout.

lender.name: Harvey clan
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a fantastic opportunity to directly give assistance to people who are less fortunate than I am. In addition, it's a great way to help people connect to others in different parts of the world, and understand how all of our lives are interrelated.
lender.occupational_info: Forming businesses, helping them grow, and ultimately coming up with a game plan for the business owners to exit their organization.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

lender.name: Jaye
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that such a small amount can make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: Attending seminary

lender.name: Abel
lender.loan_because: Someone helped to me... Why don't do the same?
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Information Technology specialist.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that I have all my needs, and a lot of my wants, met. I would like others to be able to say the same.
lender.occupational_info: Commuter trains, not orchestras.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: I can and if you can you should
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school math teacher, football coach, activity sponsor, and inspiring brew master.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: helping people to benefit from the latest technologies

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It is a small, simple thing that I can do to help someone to help themselves. Also it helps to remind me how connected we all really are.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: Because I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I work with lawyers to help people who have been badly injured, through no fault of their own, to recover money to help with their living expenses and medical bills and to motivate corporations and governments to make the world a safer place. My husband and I also own a mobile cat grooming business with my husband as the Cat Whispering groomer and me as the organizing force. We love it.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make products that help doctors look at your baby before it's born, or check to see if your heart is working right.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Doing taxes and checking the books of private companies.

lender.name: Grace
lender.occupational_info: me gustaria poner mi propio restaurant

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: Last year we visited Tanzania and it taught me how people endure day to day, and as a High School student I want to be able to support someone in need since they have to struggle for survival.
lender.occupational_info: I am a varsity cross country runner, Jazz musician and someone who believes in humanity. I choose to be respectful to others ideas. In a small way is my contribution in making a difference. A gift on my father birthday, someone who has taught me about "GIVING".

lender.name: brad
lender.loan_because: small amounts of money can make an incredible difference in people's lives, and i want to help change the world, one small loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: i work behind the scenes helping make movies get shot and large events happen.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I'm so thankful for the good fortune I've had, and helping others puts a smile on my face. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I herd cats for a living. ;-)

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: A friend told me about this program and I thought it was a great way to help people who are motivated but just need a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and Mother.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to promote entrepreneuerism throughout the world. I think it is the way for people to truly lift themselves out of poverty and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with business owners to help them reach their goals.

lender.name: Bernal
lender.loan_because: It's the minimum I can do in order to retain some dignity living in the system we live

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I care about those living in poverty. I have been blessed to have witnessed first hand what a small amount of money can do for those in need and because of that I feel compelled to give.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand how successful entrepreneurs can be.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students about people and places, and the power they have to change the world.

lender.name: George and Vince
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are able to. By cutting back on our misc. expenses we are able to help others reach thier dream or just make a nice living.
lender.occupational_info: we have been lovers / husbands for over 14 years. Our passion is assiting others when we can. As for work, we both have great jobs that we are thankful to God for, we are truly blessed.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: Because like Jesus said blessed are the peace makers and those that take care of the poor.

lender.name: Christiane & Estelle
lender.loan_because: to make a difference in other people's lives.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: It's fun
lender.occupational_info: software developer for sound systems for live theater

lender.name: nicole zoe and alan
lender.loan_because: we are so fortunate that its only right to help others.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: it's nice to be reminded that people can help other people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Fun and interesting...very different than what you think it is...

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: My Aunt Diana got me started as a gift to teach me that it is always a blessing to give to others.

lender.name: Muni
lender.loan_because: It is my honor to share with others.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a mother of three children. The picture is of my youngest, Juliet. She was born with a heart-defect, but is doing well now. Our son Max is five. Maya is three. We almost lost our dear Max last year, due to a very serious illness. He is still undergoing countless surgeries due to complications. We are grateful for the Gift of Life.
I honor all those men and women all over the World who work hard to make a living and to raise their families. God bless you all, and may our small donations be of help for you somehow. We are all connected in this world.
Baha'u'llah said "Ye are all the fruits of one tree, and the leaves of one branch".

lender.name: anadela
lender.loan_because: we got a restaurat right now but we want to change our bussinnes we are thinking to make a hotel over the the property that we own right know
lender.occupational_info: it is a god job but we work too much at night so we are geting tired that why we want to change our bussines

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: it is obvious that the entrepreneurial spirit is alive and well around the world. I believe that people willing to take a risk deserve the support of those who are able to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Advertising Sales

lender.name: kiira
lender.loan_because: Even if little at a time, I wanna help someone in developing countries make their "dreams" come true (hopefully).

lender.name: Tor Yngve
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm breeding horses for harness racing. (trot)

lender.name: Elisha and Kumiko
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to improve their lives, especially those who have children.

lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.loan_because: This feels great. I feel useful.
lender.occupational_info: Provide administrative support to folks who are trying to develop a vaccine for HIV.

lender.name: Alysia
lender.loan_because: i am a lucky person with a great life, and i don't think other people should be without a chance to prove themselves worthy.
lender.occupational_info: i work with students and adults on old-fashioned sailing ships, having adventures.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: My partner and I have been poor and We know what its like to try. We hope it goes a small way toward making things better
lender.occupational_info: We try to help those who will make a difference.

lender.name: WightCrow
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people from around the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people that believe things can get better.

lender.name: Luis Garcia
lender.loan_because: I THINK EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE A CHANCE TO IMPROVE ONE'S LIFE, AND IF YOU CAN HELP WITH THAT DREAM THEN WHY NOT, IT IS BETTER TO GIVE ANYWAY.
lender.occupational_info: MY WORK ITS HARD SOMETIMES ,BUT I LIKE HELPING PEOPLE AND THIS IS A WAY TO GIVE BACK TO THE COMMUNITY, AND ARE YOU KIDDING ME!!! I EVEN GET PAYED TO DO IT.

lender.name: Mackay Family
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others who wish to better themselves and improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate in Panama City Florida, USA

lender.name: Wolf-Dieter
lender.loan_because: I live in a society of excess. A little of that excess can be spent on something constructive, and make a difference to someone else in the world (and in memory of Robin)
lender.occupational_info: Project work in developing new mining resources

lender.name: Loretta
lender.loan_because: it empowers people to positively change their life and at the same time empowers me in my efforts to make this world a better place. We are so rich in the western world; it feels fantastic to be able to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Gr6/7 classroom with children with special needs (autistic, learning challenged) and assist them in integrating into the classroom, socially and educationally.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.occupation: Vice President, Planned Parenthood, San Diego
lender.loan_because: it is an amazing opportunity to make real the promise of our global community. We all have something to learn from, and offer to, each other. My daughter and I are proud to support Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency which empowers women and men to make their own decisions about when they will have children and how many they will have.

lender.name: Rania Ray
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to know you helped someone you don't even know but what a difference it can make to someone's life who's in need of just an extra helping hand. Cheers, Rania
lender.occupational_info: Married with 2 kids and loves to be around family and friends.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: this is what the Internet is for -- connecting people in meaningful ways.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a committed team working to help the homeless become self sufficient.

lender.name: Electra
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others! My grandfather and great grandmother were Greek immigrants, so I have a soft spot in my heart for others abroad striving to make a better life for their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a Mom and wife first, but I also run 2 online businesses: I am an affiliate for PhilosophersNotes: www.Wisdomology101.com sells inspiring 20 minute mP3 summaries of some of the greatest self development books and works by philosophers. Concentrated wisdom where you can absorb the "big ideas" of books and instantly apply them to your life! Think inspiring audio "CliffsNotes"- click the link for one FREE mP3!
www.ElectrasMonograms.com is my site where we make stylish monogram decals for everything-from your cell phone to your wall, we embellish it all! * A portion of all proceeds from sales in these shops funnels right back to KIVA! *
I love Kiva! To think the money you could throw away at the dollar store...could help change a person and a family's trajectory somewhere around the globe- it is just awesome. Thanks Kiva for letting all of us be agents of change!

lender.name: Cayley VOS
lender.loan_because: I hope to be able to share some of the things I have gained and received. Everyone deserves to have a chance to create something of their own.
lender.occupational_info: create websites and get them to the top of search engines

lender.name: Tru & Nahanni
lender.loan_because: While we are far from wealthy by North American standards, we recognize that we are extremely fortunate compared to so many others in our world.

lender.name: IUOE-381
lender.loan_because: We believe in brotherhood as well as capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: We are individual members of the International Union of Operating Engineers, Local 381.

lender.name: sousan
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help in a small way those who live in a very challenging environments and are trying to work hard to make life a little better for themselves and their family. I am happy Kiva has made it possible to loan to people I never met, specially those with kids.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I have a little exstra, so why not use them to help other people to improve.
lender.occupational_info: I was an administration assistent in the same company for 18 years. In June 2008 I got a new job and beside that I have a little business of my own

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: We've been very lucky in life and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teams of people to make computer websites that run factories.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: Small streams become mighty rivers.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: if lending a little bit of money can help to make the world just a little bit better place to live then thats the least I can do

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I like to help whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I recently finished my engineering degree, and am currently programming user interfaces for mobile phones.

lender.name: Noriko
lender.loan_because: 頑張っている人たちを応援したいから
lender.occupational_info: 夢と目標の実現をサポートする

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help someone else
lender.occupational_info: I look after my 15 month old son at home

lender.name: Ryutaro
lender.loan_because: I'd like to contribute for anyone willing to work. If my loan can be helpful for them, it's my pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a controller in a European telecom-related company.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I have worked hard for everything I have and I want to help people who are also working hard and not just sitting back asking for government handouts.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare professional

lender.name: Mary Frances
lender.loan_because: it is something I can do to be more connected to the world. I must mention that these loans are being made in my mother's honor, she passed away in September 2007. I had been looking forward to doing this with her but alas, it was not to be. Thanks to all who made donations in her memory! They are doing some good!

lender.name: Jenny Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: EditMe, LLC
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to make an honorable livelihood. EditMe uses deferred revenue from customer prepayments to fund Kiva loans.
lender.occupational_info: EditMe is an Internet business that provides easily editable web sites to individuals and businesses.

lender.name: Dawn and Andy
lender.loan_because: we can!!

lender.name: Gisela
lender.loan_because: We are one people in one world.
lender.occupational_info: I help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupation: Trail Dawg, Grand Teton National Park
lender.loan_because: It is a way to give thanks for the many opportunities I have received in life.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I think under the right conditions (mostly the existence of a government that protects life, liberty, and property), microlending can stimulate economic growth and that under all circumstances it can help individuals and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand the wealth question, to wit why some nations are so much poorer than others.

lender.name: TOVAR
lender.loan_because: nesecito un prestamo de 12.000,oo Ds.quiero comprar un negocio establecido de medicina natural alternativa para trabajarlo en familia
lender.occupational_info: salgo a las 7 am visito un promedio de 12 clientes para venta y algo similar al cobro tengo 30 años de experiencia y quisiera establecer un negocio propio

lender.name: Calico
lender.loan_because: Assist others to realize their hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I create and restore native plant landscapes and work to learn, practice, and share sustainable gardening and living skills. Seed collection and seed saving is an important component.

lender.name: Anna-Lisa
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is for women to find funding to improve the lives of their families. I want to assist other mothers and wives in their search for a future of hope.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in my life by others, both monetarily and otherwise. It is one small way of paying the generosity of others back and somewhat "paying it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large organization that sells building materials to residential and commercial builders.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Whoever oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, but whoever is kind to the needy honors God. [Proverbs 14:31]
lender.occupational_info: I support efforts to raise support for a religious community, assist in management of donor relations, and raise awareness and advocacy for social justice concerns. More information is found at www.divineprovidenceweb.org www.justiceforlifecdp.wordpress.com

lender.name: A et C
lender.loan_because: to help, to make the life better...

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is at least some of the answer to the problems in the developing world
lender.occupational_info: I teach class music to students from 11 - 18. I also teach the piano, clarinet and saxophone. I play classical and jazz music on these instruments. I also run the Essential Music Practice website and have written a book about how to practice music more effectively called "Practice Makes Perfect"

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity to help someone less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help enhance the lives of children with autism.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Its one way to help.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: wealth is reponsability

lender.name: Gillette Family
lender.loan_because: micro-loans are excellent development work.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it helps creative energy flow where it's needed.

lender.name: Tis
lender.loan_because: this is a lovely way to increase warm fuzzies.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in a brick cubicle and find the perfect words. And pretend I'm looking at the ocean.

lender.name: Verna
lender.loan_because: We all have an obligation to help our brothers and sisters. Whether they live in our neighborhood or across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I work each day on finding funders for the organization I work for. We work with homeless adults and provide them with the tools they need to get their lives back on track.

lender.name: strongwind
lender.loan_because: I would like to help many people in Latin America countries to sell goods and the same time give them some credits.
lender.occupational_info: Wholesale international businessman with capacity to find any product aroun the world.

lender.name: ptr & amy
lender.loan_because: We love God. We love God's people.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I study the ways that insects and plants live together.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: kaya
lender.occupation: third grade student in Ashland, Oregon

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: We need to improve living conditions in many countries around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after teaching in secondary schools for 36 years. In addition to teaching Computer Science for 18 years in the USA, I taught 18 years overseas in Malaysia, Samoa, Peru, the Dominican Republic, and Indonesia.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: It gives someone a chance to get their business started, yet gives them an incentive to become self-sufficient so they can eventually pay their loans off.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is very interested in learning about different cultures, traveling, and lending a helping hand to anyone who needs one. These interests of mine were spurred by a global studies class I took called Teens Around the World.

lender.name: jamie
lender.loan_because: To try to make a difference to the business people around the world. I know a loan can change someone's world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupational_info: Evaluating insurance for insurance companies

lender.name: Harville Fam
lender.loan_because: "I can do everything through him who gives me strength. Yet it was good of you to share in my troubles. Moreover, as you Philippians know, in the early days of your acquaintance with the gospel, when I set out from Macedonia, not one church shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving, except you only; for even when I was in Thessalonica, you sent me aid again and again when I was in need. Not that I am looking for a gift, but I am looking for what may be credited to your account. I have received full payment and even more; I am amply supplied, now that I have received from Epaphroditus the gifts you sent. They are a fragrant offering, an acceptable sacrifice, pleasing to God. And my God will meet all your needs according to his glorious riches in Christ Jesus. To our God and Father be glory for ever and ever. Amen. " Php 4:13-20

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: what goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the administrator of a group of people who volunteer in a local hospital.

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach undergraduate chemistry laboratory classes at a state university

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I hope to honor my family and give these loans in recognition of our daughters - great young women who give much in their own special way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, assisting others to meet our goals. My tools my faith, brain, heart, hands, computer, printer, telephone, and other office machines.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings!

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I try to correct the imbalance

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: My family needs our OWN HOUSE. I have 2 small boys and they need their room and place to run, ride abike or play football.
lender.occupational_info: Actually I don't have a worj, only in the house (cleaning, cooking and helping my kids)

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: Iwant to help someone in the world who is struggling survive and make a better life for themself and thier family
lender.occupational_info: I help control the inventory in a factory that makes kitchen and bathroom cabinets

lender.name: Alaine
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping others. I'm very blessed and I feel we as humans all do better when we help one another.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.occupation: I also started my business. Good luck & Love!

lender.name: Zoe
lender.occupational_info: I work with students age 15-22 with severe disabilities.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses helping them with all their computer needs.
